item.title: Code
item.description: I’ve been working with computers for almost 15 years, 5 as a senior. Check out my projects or take a look at my professional profile.

item.title: Music
item.description: Piano is an old passion (since 1998). Still practicing in my sparring time. Please don’t judge me.

item.title: Photo
item.description: “You don’t take a photograph, you make it.” - Ansel Adams I’m an amateur photographer. I like street photography, nature and portraits. Check out my instagram.
